Drunkens & Dragons: https://goo.gl/38dCmJ
ICRPG: http://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/212262/INDEX-CARD-RPG-Core-Set?manufacturers_id=10923&affiliate_id=837068

A really special 50th Episode Special. The man, the myth, the legend....Hankerin' Ferinale himself of Drunkens & Dragons and Runehammer Games made the long voyage to Winnipeg to hang out, play some ICRPG, share a few (many) drinks, and discuss tabletop gaming and terrain.















Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: 50th Episode Special with Drunkens & Dragons! (Black Magic Craft Episode 050)
